name: Lord of the Rings: Card Game
description: A cooperative living card game set in J.R.R. Tolkien's iconic Middle-earth. Players work together to complete a series of narrative-driven quests. Each player controls heroes and constructs a deck to face challenges, including combat, questing, and overcoming treacherous encounters. The game is praised for its thematic depth, strategic deck-building, and the ability to customize and expand one's game experience.
